    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Costume Design  &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: May 23, 2014
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/costume

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17079566">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17079566">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17079566">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17079566">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17079566" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17079568">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17079568">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17079568">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Key resources:
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17079568">
          <div id="boxatt17079568" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20131786">
              <a id="link_20131786" href="http://www.metmuseum.org/toah/intro/atr/06sm.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20131786,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Costume Design ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19277405}); ">
               Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Sponsored by the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Locate artists from the time period being researched, who may have depicted costumes of the day.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20131790">
              History of Costume 3100 B.C.-1992 DVD
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library, ON RESERVE)
               <br />
               This DVD can be checked out of the library. The first use on any PC will require a key code, written on the DVD case and on the DVD itself.
               <br />
               <br />
               The companion notebooks, kept with the slide collection from which the DVD was made commercially, can be useful for purposes of clarification. Ask for the "History of Costume slide collection notebooks" at the Trexler Library circulation desk.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20131836">
              <a id="link_20131836" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20131836,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Costume Design ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. A union catalog of libraries throughout the U.S. and Europe. Choose the ILL (interlibrary loan) link from within an individual title's record to request that book from another library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20131848">
              <a id="link_20131848" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20131848,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Costume Design ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Index to scholarly journal articles related to all non-U.S. history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20131852">
              <a id="link_20131852" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/ativ/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20131852,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Costume Design ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715956}); ">
               Theatre in Video
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Great performances, full-length, of major dramatic works.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17079569">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17079569">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17079569">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional resources:
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17079569">
          <p>
           <em>
            McGraw-Hill Encyclopedia of World Drama
           </em>
           (Trexler Library 809.2 M147)
           <br />
           Good for retrieving dates of play authorship, as well as background information.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Chronology of the Expanding World 1492 to 1762
           </em>
           (Trexler Library 909.08 W725c)
           <br />
           and
           <br />
           <em>
            Chronology of the Modern World 1763 to 1992
           </em>
           (Trexler Library Reference 909.08 W725ch)
           <br />
           Useful for locating literary figures and other persons and events contemporaneous with a given play.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17079569" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642911" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17079573">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17079573">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17079573">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17079573">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           . Here is a user
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            guide
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17079573" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
